issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI --> Window Properties.
3. Tap on toggle height/width.

h5.Actual Result:
1. Tapping on toggle height/width changes the background color to black & does not change height/width as expected.

h5.Expected Result:
1. The height /width of the window should change accordingly
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink : Toggle height/width test in window properties just changes the background to black
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634
Ti SDK : 3.2.2.GA
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.1	
CLI - 3.2.3-dev
BB Z10 - 10.2.1.2.2156
Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body: On BlackBerry, a window takes the entire screen size. Width, height, top, bottom. right, and left are not to be touched.
Closing issue as we no longer offer support for BlackBerry.
